thread.title: ISIS targeted in 24 air attacks by US-led coalition: Statement - Region - World
thread.title_full: ISIS targeted in 24 air attacks by US-led coalition: Statement - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: ISIS targeted in 24 air attacks by US-led coalition: Statement - Region - World
text:
Related Rebels battle ISIS after advance in Syria's Aleppo US targets Islamic State with 15 air strikes in Syria, Iraq: Statement France hits ISIS targets in Syria a second time: Defence minister US, allies hit Islamic State with 27 air strikes: Statement US, allies conduct 30 air strikes against Islamic State: US military US, allies launch 25 air strikes in Iraq, eight in Syria: US US, allies hit Islamic State in Iraq with 21 air strikes: Military The United States and its allies staged 24 air strikes on ISIS in Syria and Iraq on Saturday, the Combined Joint Task Force said in a statement on Sunday.
Seventeen of the attacks were in Iraq, targeting ISIS near 10 cities and hitting tactical units, buildings, weapons, fighting positions and other assets, the task force said.
In Syria, seven strikes struck similar targets, as well as a crude oil collection point.
